title: test_secure_authentication_with_role_based_access_control
description: Verify that the authentication system using Supabase Auth correctly authenticates users and enforces role-based access control for different user roles.

title: test_crud_operations_for_service_orders
description: Validate the creation, retrieval, update, and deletion of service orders with multiple statuses, priorities, and client approvals.

title: test_client_management_with_cpf_cnpj_validation
description: Ensure that client registration and management correctly validate CPF and CNPJ identifiers and allow proper client data handling.

title: test_client_portal_access_and_order_tracking
description: Test that clients can securely access their dedicated portal to track service order statuses and approve services online.

title: test_apple_equipment_registration_and_warranty_status
description: Verify the registration and management of Apple equipment including historical data and warranty status tracking.

title: test_financial_system_payment_processing_and_reporting
description: Validate the financial system's ability to process multiple payment methods, generate financial metrics, and produce accurate reports.

title: test_parts_and_inventory_management_with_cost_control
description: Ensure parts and inventory management correctly tracks parts usage, stock levels, and cost control per service order.

title: test_automatic_email_notifications_and_whatsapp_integration
description: Verify that the system sends automatic email notifications on status changes and correctly integrates with WhatsApp messaging.

title: test_api_endpoint_ordens_servico
description: Test the /api/ordens-servico endpoint for correct handling of service order CRUD operations with proper authentication and authorization.

title: test_api_endpoint_portal_login
description: Validate the /api/portal/login endpoint to ensure secure client login and session management for portal access.
